title: This Week in Tech: Porsche Builds an E-Bike, Blackheart’s New Titanium Frame, and New Trek Project One Colorways
content:
Trek releases environmentally-friendly signature colorways, a new Rapha jacket, 5Dev releases short length titanium cranks, and more.

Read the full article at This Week in Tech: Porsche Builds an E-Bike, Blackheart’s New Titanium Frame, and New Trek Project One Colorways on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
